Our History

The Flax Bourton Hub is centred on a modern and well-equipped one storey building and small playing field in the North Somerset village of Flax Bourton

It is served by a dedicated service road, good footpaths and a cycle track which is part of the Sustrans national network. There is also a small childrenâ€™s play area nearby

Historically, the facility was built and provided by Persimmons Builders some 20 years ago, as part of a quid pro quo arrangement with the Village resulting in the build of a medium sized housing estate which partially wraps around the field.

The Hub provides an important and contrasting community facility which balances and greatly extends opportunities for residents to pursue a range of interests, activities and sports in a pleasant environment.

The village has a strong record of promoting social events with many different activities taking place throughout the year. These are supported by residents of all ages. Up to the Lock-down periods many of these took place at the Hub.

The responsibility of managing the Hub has recently passed from a Community Interest Company back to the Parish Council. The Council are working with a group of local volunteers to restore and develop the facilities as lock-down is eased.

Learn More About The Council and Volunteering

20 years serving the community

How To Find Us

'

Covid changes

in order to keep within current government covid guidelines only our main hall is available to one hirer at this time. We hope as the situation improves to open a pop up cafe and to hire out the other meeting areas

Cleaning

The kitchen and main areas will be cleaned according to government covid guidelines between each hire period

The Sports field

Hiring the sports field only may impact on the ability to hire out the main hall ( and vice versa ) and will need to be approved by the bookings admninstrator

Terms and Conditions

You can find our full terms and conditions for hire here
Please note some key points for all hirers

Party Time

Why not have your party at the hub? We are licensed for music and dancing until 11pm Sunday to Thursday and to midnight on Friday and Saturday

Noise

The hub is close to residents and every effort must be made to limit noise when entering or leaving the hub

Toilets

Toilet facilities are shared on Saturdays between bookings in the main hall and users of our sports field. Combined hire is possible for some Saturdays by arrangement. Please email bookings@flaxbourtonhub.org to enquire

Payments

You will be required to pay for your hire before your event. We will be offering Paypal for your convenience and will send you an invoice via email when the facility is active. You may be required to pay a deposit for some types of event

Fixings

Please do not fix or hang anything on to the walls of the building.

Cleaning up

Please make sure you wash up and tidy the kitchen surfaces and remove your trash after your event. This will help the deep covid clean that needs to take place after your event.

Security

You must make sure that all windows and doors are securely locked after your event

Pricing

  • Payments will be possible on this website via PayPal shortly
  • You will not be invoiced until this facility is in place.
  • If you wish to use the kitchen crockery and glasses there is a supplemental charge of Â£25

Testimonials

Colin Rogers
Local Guide

Great place for holding a tea dance. Floor is great for "Sequence Dances". Catering facilities are second to none. Toilets are very clean.

Laura Johnson
Great for a party

Used this venue for a ceilidh dance, Had around 50 guests it was the perfect size for 5 large tables, a stage, dance floor and buffet. I arrived early and they came to open the doors and were quick coming back at the end of the night. The venue is clean and has plenty of items available to hire that you need for a party.

Maggie Seager
Personal and Business use

This hall has fantastic facilities, we use it every year and would highly recommend it, reasonable rates and the ease of booking is great. It is a fabulous venue suitable for both business and personal events alike..
